name: botbuilder
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Bot Builder is a framework for building rich bots on virtually any platform.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder .\lib\index.d.ts ..\botbuilder-core\lib\index.d.ts ..\botbuilder-core-extensions\lib\index.d.ts ..\botframework-schema\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK" --readme none
